article: It was getting dark. Some children and two Canadian women were still  _  on the ice near a big hotel. They were having a good time. Suddenly the ice  _  . One of the boys fell into the water. The children shouted,"Help! Help!"They didn't know  _  to do. The two Canadian women heard  _  and skated over to get the boy out of the water. The ice was  _  . The two Canadians fell into the water, too. But they tried their best to  _  the little boy. They knew they must be  _  . If they didn't push him up onto the ice, he would soon die. Many people ran over to  _  them. Some of them had ropes and poles. A young man jumped into the water to save the  _  people. The boy and the two Canadian women were out of water at last. One of the women didn't feel well. She was sent to the  _  at once. But she felt very happy because the boy was saved.
